attributes.action: Prevent companies penalising people who pay their bills on time using cash or cheques
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British Telecom has become the latest company to charge a 'processing' fee for those people who choose to pay their bills in cash or by cheque. They intend to charge £4.50 per quarter.

Why should customers be penalised for paying in cash? It is little more than corporate greed and the practice should be stopped.
